vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.32;
father of: Bela (H1106)
§ Beor = "burning"
1) father of Balaam
2) father of Bela, king of Edom
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Bela; edomita; (b)   padre de Balaam
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比珥 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "焚燒"
1) 巴蘭的父親
2) 巴勒的父親, 以東的國王 (創36:32;代上1:43)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
比珥 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "焚烧"
1) 巴兰的父亲
2) 巴勒的父亲, 以东的国王 (创36:32;代上1:43)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.22.5;
father of: Balaam (H1109A)
Also named: Bosor, Beōr<\i> (Βοσόρ, Βεώρ "Beor" G1007)
§ Beor = "burning"
1) father of Balaam
2) father of Bela, king of Edom
